Thanks!

Another way to get it working is to extract the first win rar file and open the bin file with AlZip. Then save it as a zip and unzip it again. You can then install it perfectly - at least it worked for me.

firstly: make sure u set your folder options so you can see file extensions of known types

make sure u have winrar (rarlab.com i believe)

then: double click the file ending .rar

extract to whereever (its irrelevant but know the location)

this should extract 2 files ... one ending .bin and the other .cue

the .cue is the file that tells the burning software what to burn ... in this case 1 file, the .bin file.

im not sure whether u can use a program like daemon tools on this file but i decided to burn to have a hard copy.

i recommend getting Alcohol 120%:
http://torrents.thepiratebay.org/hashtorrent/3595459.torrent/Alcohol.120.1.9.6.4719.inc.keygen.patch-BetaMaster.3595459.TPB.torrent

open alcohol up, burn image file: select the .cue file and watch that baby burn!

cant really make it any clearer than that.

(u mite want to go back to folder options and turn off the known extensions showing)

-Spoil3r
